ItemTooltips.gem: If there's an invisible enemy carry and you have someone tanky on your team, you can buy the gem for them.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Turn this off if you don't want your lane pushed.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Use force staff to save yourself and allies.
ItemTooltips.sphere: Not the best support item, but if your team is doing well and you have the farm, Linken's is an awesome Windrunner item.

AbilityTooltips.windrunner_shackleshot: Try to line the enemy hero up with trees. This skill is pretty useless if the shackle doesn't hit a tree or enemy unit.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_powershot: Very powerful against heroes during the early game. Can use to push creeps back pretty effectively. Also destroys trees and gives vision.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_windrun: Very good for escaping early ganks.
AbilityTooltips.windrunner_focusfire: You can get your ultimate earlier if you are pushing towers, but you should keep it level one if there are more skills to max.
